help_message: Frequently Asked Questions Q: How do I buy an account? A: First, add funds using the '{add_funds_btn}' button. Once your balance is updated, click '{buy_accounts_btn}' and follow the instructions. Q: How long does a deposit take? A: Crypto Bot payments are instant. Manual deposits are approved by our admins and can take from a few minutes to a few hours. Q: How are accounts delivered? A: Accounts are delivered instantly after purchase as a .zip file or via a one-by-one manual OTP process.
